data.name: AdditionalPostEffects
data.value: Simulates the effect of raindrops on the screen.

data.name: AntiAliasing
data.value: Smoothing is a technique used to eliminate jagged edges on objects.

data.name: authorAbout
data.value: Hi. We are two friends who adore Need for Speed, so 🍋 Lemon Gang Corner 💿 created the Xtreme Terrex mod and the Launcher is the work of "Кодерские работы". If you like our projects, we'd love your subscriptions.

data.name: authorThanks
data.value: We made this mod with love and for the fan. Your ideas and suggestions are the fuel for us to make the mod and the launcher even cooler. Write to us, share your thoughts in our official channels, let's pump up the game together! Love, enthusiastic team ❤️

data.name: CarGeometryDetail
data.value: Determines the level of detail for vehicles. In some cases, this may remove details such as interior or light reflections.

data.name: CarReflectionDetail
data.value: Controls the level of detail of the world reflected in the reflections of vehicles.

data.name: CarReflectionResolutionScale
data.value: Controls the sharpness of the vehicle reflection.

data.name: CarReflectionUpdateRate
data.value: Adjusts the refresh rate of the vehicle reflection.

data.name: changeLanguage
data.value: You have just made changes to the language settings, the Launcher will restart.

data.name: CutscenesAspectRatio
data.value: This option determines the aspect ratio in which the videos will be displayed on the screen. If you have problems with cropping videos, adjust this option.

data.name: DynamicShadows
data.value: Controls the sharpness of the image in the rearview mirror.

data.name: DynamicShadowsResolution
data.value: Sets the quality and realism of reflections.

data.name: GameControllerSupport
data.value: Enables controller support that you want to use.

data.name: GameDifficulty
data.value: If you have photosensitivity, this option will replace the videos with versions that do not contain bright flashes. In addition, there is no music copyright here, so you can use it for streaming or uploading to video platforms, such as YouTube.

data.name: GeneralReflectionDetail
data.value: Determines the amount of detail of the world visible in the rearview mirror.

data.name: incorretPathMessage
data.value: The path you chose was wrong. Try again.

data.name: MirrorReflectionDetail
data.value: How sharp will the road reflection be.

data.name: MirrorReflectionResolutionScale
data.value: Controls the sharpness of the road reflections.

data.name: networkErrorMessage
data.value: You do not have an Internet connection. Check your internet connection.

data.name: networkUpdateInstalled
data.value: You have the latest version of the game installed

data.name: RainEffect
data.value: Determines whether dynamic shadows are enabled in real time, corresponding to the angle of the sun. Enabling partial dynamic shadows extends this effect to moving objects, such as vehicles and objects of the surrounding world. Choosing any option other than ‘Enabled’ will use static shadows created in advance.

data.name: RearviewMirrorForAllCarCameraViews
data.value: Introduces subtle cinematic effects, such as glow, film grain, vignetting, chromatic aberration and image level correction.

data.name: RoadReflectionsDetail
data.value: Determines the amount of detail of the world reflected in the road reflections.

data.name: RoadReflectionsResolutionScale
data.value: How much detail of the world will be reflected in the road reflection.

data.name: SafetyCheckCutscenes
data.value: Enables rearview mirror for all types of car camera. If disabled, it will only be visible in bumper and hood camera modes.

data.name: settingsLauncherTitle
data.value: Here you can change the launcher settings

data.name: TextureFiltering
data.value: Texture filtering controls how a 2D image (texture) is displayed on a 3D model, increasing the sharpness of the surface at a distance.

data.name: UserInterfaceSafeZone
data.value: Safe zones prevent the user interface from appearing in technically used but invisible to the player areas, such as the edge of the screen.

data.name: VSync
data.value: V-Sync synchronizes the frame rate of the game with the refresh rate of your monitor to eliminate image tearing

data.name: WindowedMode
data.value: It will change when your game is running in full-screen mode or windowed mode

data.name: WorldLevelOfDetail
data.value: Determines the level of detail of the environment. Reducing the quality removes some models/props and lowers the resolution of textures.
